website_summaries.verdict: If you are a serious air hockey player, you may want to invest in this top-notch table. But for the casual player, others on our list offer similar action and much lower prices.
pros: A sturdy, well-made table built for fast-action fun
Has built-in LED lighting and music, and impressive airflow
cons: It's also very heavy and takes some time effort to assemble

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it lasted, but unfortunately it only lasted about a year, if that. Then it began losing force in the air pressure, plastic on the sides began peeling. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Childrens L.

customer_reviews.title: Bad product .
customer_reviews.text: That table is damage and one of the lights is not working .
customer_reviews.author: Tannya favela

customer_reviews.title: This table is fun
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old and I play almost every night. The scoring board works well and it will provide for a 5 minute game. The LED lights are cool and my son's friends and him really like to play in the dark. The LED puck work for the most part, but I suspect that after a month of beatings they will probably stop working. The airflow on this machine is good. This machine is sturdy and heavy. I put this together by myself. Please keep in mind, that after assembly you will need more than 2 people to flip the machine right side up (the instructions recommend that the machine be assembled upside down).
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Super crap. Broke after a week of use
customer_reviews.text: Super crap. Broke after a week of use . No score keeping . Stuck with it because we didn’t use post to till a month after we bought. Don’t buy 💩
customer_reviews.author: nancy burak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for kids or adults
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying it and not liking it, but this table has been amazing. It was relatively easy to assemble but it took a good hour to finish. Everything works perfectly. Absolutely a ton of fun with the lights out. It is extremely heavy so plan to have 4 strong adults to flip it once assembled. I have kids ranging from 4-13 and they think it’s a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great way to make memories!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have loved our air hockey table. It's so unique with the way the table lights up as well as the pucks and controllers too! We have had a blast having air hockey championships and all the kids love coming over.
customer_reviews.author: V. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: True arcade experience
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Assembled in about two hours. Had to drill pilot holes for most screws. Took four strong adults to flip over. Lights and sounds make it feel like a true arcade game. After two weeks of play, had no trouble with pucks flying off the table or black marks appearing. However, one side does not record goals. Company is sending a new sensor that I must figure out how to install. Otherwise would rate 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: snook1

customer_reviews.title: Fun table but not durable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this table for our boys for Christmas and it looks great, functions well, but started chipping the plastic away after only a couple of days. Very disappointing after spending a substantial amount for what we believed should be a quality product. We will be reaching out to manufacturer to see if there’s anything they can do to resolve this.
customer_reviews.author: Azmom

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged. I want to drive it thru your window
customer_reviews.text: I just inboxed this unit and it’s broken. Ordered this a long time ago and am pretty peeved
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Winalis

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought this knowing our little kids are starting to be teenagers, and our teenagers are going to be adults. It’s fun for everyone. Looks good, sounds great, and best for the money. We decided to turn our kids playroom into a game room so more games will come. But this is by far the best table and reviews I saw that made me grab this. The kids were all in disbelief it was so big and lit up with sounds. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: Air flow hasn't worked since we got the table. Now it just takes up a bunch of space in our office and is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad electronics
customer_reviews.text: It’s been in service for two days now and the scoring mechanism does not work now. It won’t register goals scored and it starts every new game with a 1 to 0 score...one the phone with Amazon customer service in India. Wish me luck...
customer_reviews.author: Will Gabri

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it. Really nice table
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Really nice table. We did have a problem with the electrical score board but the company is replacing it. So far it hasn't arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: This item works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: This is an INCREDIBLE air hockey table. I have two daighters - ages 8 and 5 - it is perfect for them and for me and my wife. The table works incredibly well and the lights add so much extra fun. I have been quite impressed by the variations on the lights and by how easy it is to operate this table. SO happy we went with this one. It’s incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Kanter

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it!!!! Very cool game. Great lights and can be used in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: scott a biernot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table, built very strong and exciting to play. Great for kids and adults alike. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Oh yes, one of the best product I bought. Really nice looking and very heavy duty not so bad to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this air hockey table is the best the lights and sound are very cool
customer_reviews.text: this air hockey table is the best the lights and sound are very cool. it took a 4 hours to put it together with 2 people. but be warned this table is super heavy
customer_reviews.author: thelonewolf

customer_reviews.title: Score sensor stopped working in less than 2 weeks!  No idea how to get it repaired!
customer_reviews.text: Was a bear to put together. Score sensor on one side stopped working in less than 2 weeks. I don't know how to get it repaired! Ids there a warranty on this table???
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Montes

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great air hockey game! Family is addicted. Love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great table! great airflow! the lilghts and sounds make all the difference! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alan R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon CS did a great job of coordinating a replacement table
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived looking ok while still in packing, but was discovered to be badly damaged once fully unwrapped and assembled, Amazon CS did a great job of coordinating a replacement table...
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very cool looking unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool looking unit. Everyone that plays is very impressed with the way it lights up. However that joy is cut short when we realized how poorly it is constructed. We've had it for a few weeks and the edge where the puck hits is cracked already. Sad because it seemed so cool.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Fan is not strong enough.
customer_reviews.text: The fan under the table is not has strong as it should be and the sides of the table are very sharp as a result I'm always cutting myself.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed........
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this for my girls for Christmas and just to find out they made a mistake and canceled my order very disappointed now what to do ugh.....
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bower

customer_reviews.title: Great table if you don't want to keep score
customer_reviews.text: Within the first 10 games, scoring system stopped scoring. I've seen a lot of people with the same problem (look in other 1 star reviews). I saw a response from wecare@escaladesports.com and I can tell you they don't. If they cared, they would at least have answered my email inquiry and told me how to get this fixed. And don't play too hard, as the sides dent easily, paint scratches, and it's just a disappointment overall. But, other than that, it's pretty fun to play. Just waiting for the air to stop now so we can use it as a table for storing stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Pete M.

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: counter went out and i tried to get a new and atomic corp would not sell me one
customer_reviews.author: william manderville

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. So much fun with the kids during this quarantine. It was hard to put together and I lost some screws so the black boarder isn't on it oh well. For what I paid for it was well worth it .
customer_reviews.author: Nykia Brooks

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought it used from someone used for 2 month then he have to leave out of town for $200 no One can beat that I love it 😀😀😀😀
customer_reviews.author: Moe I.

customer_reviews.title: wish the quality was better.  great concept.  bad execution.
customer_reviews.text: we've had this table almost a year. the light and music is great. air flow is still good. but, the wood is splintering/flying off from the puck making contact. i'm more concerned for safety than because of how it may look. for that reason alone, i wouldn't recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: mom among boys

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great air hockey table best I’ve seen in a long time
customer_reviews.author: Shyam Gulati

product_meta.title: Atomic Top Shelf 7.5’ Air Hockey Table with 120V Motor for Maximum Air Flow, High-Speed PVC Playing Surface for Arcade-Style Play and Multicolor LED Lumen-X Technology to Illuminate Play
product_meta.description: Enjoy the action-packed fun of the arcade in your own home with the Atomic Top Shelf Air Hockey Table. This classic arcade-style air hockey table features a 120V motor for maximum air flow creating consistent puck action. The slick 82" L x 41" W play surface is constructed out of PVC laminated MDF for high-speed play. Play in the dark as the LED Lumen-X technology illuminates the table with red, green, and blue multicolor light effects while listening to high-tempo music for added intensity. These interactive lights change colors during gameplay when each player scores a goal, taking the competition to another level. The fast moving game play with the LED puck and LED pushers is a game changing air hockey experience you don't want to miss! Four large legs create a stable, sturdy playing surface for premium performance. The Atomic Top Shelf Air Hockey Table includes LED accessories for exciting play in the dark! The table includes one red and one blue LED pusher and one red hexagonal LED "spinner" puck that provides challenging, unpredictable rebounds for advanced play and one red and one blue round puck for traditional game play. Try them all for hours of fun with family and friends.
feature_bullets: Action-packed air hockey table with 120V motor for maximum air flow
Slick, high-speed PVC playing surface for non-stop, arcade-style play
Illuminate play with multicolor LED Lumen-X technology and high-tempo music
82" x 41" playing surface supported by four large and durable legs
Accessories include 2 LED pusher, 2 round pucks, 1 hexagonal spinner LED puck

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
